summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3977 for the improvement of Garden Street from Rainier Avenue to 46th Avenue South, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing concrete sidewalks and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 48385 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
